bibl.title: Dispatch from Judson A. Lewis to Frederick W. Seward, October 12, 1879
Despatches from United States Consuls in Sierra Leone, 1858-1906 T-438

div1.p:
No 4 U.S. Consulate Sierra Leone Oct 12th
Judson A. Lewis To Dept State
Forwarding Quarterly Returns

Digest of Invoice Book to 117
Reg. of Official Letters Recd 118
" " " " Sent 119
Arrival & Dep. Am. Vessels 120
Return of Am. Citizens deceased 121
Quarterly Account Miscellaneous
Expenses with Vouchers 90

United States Consulate at
Sierra Leone Oct 12th 79

Hon F. W. Seward
Asst. Sec'ty. State
Washington D.C.
Sir: I have the honor to forward herewith in accordance with the Consular Regulations Returns for the Quarter Ending Sept 30th 1879.
These Returns have been made up as fully as any record found in the Consulate would permit the Record Books as a rule have been almost entirely neglected.

Digest of Invoice Book 117
Reg. of Official Letters Receivd 118
Reg of Official Letters Sent 119
Ar and Dep of Our Vessels 120
Ruturn of DeceasedAm. Citizens 121
Miscellaneous Expenses with Vouchers 90

I am Sir Your Obt Servt
J. A. Lewis
U.S. Consul
